column4: Hello! :)  I just installed a new motherboard and Ubuntu 5.10 refuses to boot entirely.  I receive an error stating that the XServer cannot be loaded.  I believe that this is the graphical environment.  How can I 'repair' my installation without losing my current configuration.. so that my new motherboard functions?
hit Ctrl+Alt+Bkspace to go into textual mode....from there....you'll need to do some hardware research and troubleshooting
reinstall it from the original Ubuntu install disk
sproingie, Sepheebear: Thanks for the info, I'll pop my Install disc in and give that a whirl!  =)
